execution_plan.description: Find the earliest visit date and return the CustomerId(s) who visited on that date from the receipts table.
execution_plan.query: SELECT CustomerId, `Date` FROM receipts WHERE `Date` = (SELECT MIN(`Date`) FROM receipts);

execution_plan.description: Get firstname and lastname for the customer(s) identified in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, firstname, lastname FROM customers WHERE id IN ($step1.CustomerId);
